alert.note: Alert for Howard; Little River; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 7:55PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Little River, Sevier, central Howard, southeastern McCurtain, northern Franklin, northwestern Bowie, northern Titus and Red River Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 754 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Grannis to 11 miles south of Pattonville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Queen, Clarksville, Dierks, Horatio, Foreman, Hagansport, Boxelder, Umpire, Idabel, De Kalb, Bogata, Lockesburg, Winthrop, Gillham, Ben Lomond, Arkinda, Center Point, Wilkerson, Deport and Talco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...southeastern Oklahoma...and northeastern Texas.
